name: Industeve
description:
Controls:

Touch Screen - Press left or right side of the screen to move to the side
Keyboard - A/D or Left/Right arrow keys

This is a prototype endless runner game that I made for practice purposes and had a lot of fun doing so. I may add to this in the future.

It has an industrial theme and you play as a robot called Steve, travelling across overhead catwalks that would be in a large factory warehouse. There are lots of obstacles in the way along the catwalks which Steve must avoid. Also, don't fall off!

You can collide with obstacles 3 times as your health reduces until it reaches 0. Falling off is an instant failure. Try to get a high score!

I cannot guarantee compatibility with all devices. I apologise if it does not work correctly on your device.
Not compatible with IOS.
